attributes.action: Do not send British troops to Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: The vast majority of the UK, Europe and the rest of the world want this war to end. Everyone is aware that sending troops to Ukraine will be seen as an escalation of the war and will take us further away from peace. The British public do not want our money and the lives of our men and women lost on this war.
attributes.background: Do not escalate the war in Ukraine by sending British troops. This will clearly make things worse, and our men and women will lose their lives.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don't send troops to Ukraine to support peacekeeping
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705814
